phoenix.impl

Class DeprecatedAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • phoenix.impl.DeprecatedAPI

  • public class DeprecatedAPI
extends java.lang.Object
    This is where phoenix apis go when they are no longer used, supported, and ready to die.

    • Method Detail

      • StartMetadataScan

        public java.lang.Object StartMetadataScan(java.lang.Object provider,
                                          java.lang.Object[] mediaFiles)
        Deprecated. provider is no longer passed
        Starts the Metadata/Fanart Scanner will an array of MediaFile objects.

        If a scan is in progress, then this scan is immediately aborted, and this scan will not happen.

        The Scanner will start a separate thread for the scan and return immediately

        TODO: Figure out a way to have the scanner notify on complete

        Parameters:
        provider - provider to use for scanning, or null, to use the default metadata provider
        mediaFiles - Object Array of Sage MediaFile or Airing objects
        Returns:
        ProgressTracker instance for the current scan, or null, if a scan could not be started

      • IsMetadataScanRunning

        public boolean IsMetadataScanRunning()
        Deprecated. use method that accepts a tracker
        Returns true if a metadata scan is currently in progress.
        Returns:
        true if scan in progress

      • GetMetadataScanComplete

        public float GetMetadataScanComplete()
        Deprecated. use method that accepts a tracker
        Returns the percent complete in the scan. 0 mean not started, 1 means completed.
        Returns:
        float value representing the percent complete of the current scan

      • GetMetadataSearchResults

        public IMetadataSearchResult[] GetMetadataSearchResults(java.lang.Object provider,
                                                        java.lang.Object mediaFile)
        Deprecated. provider is no longer used
        Performa metadata search using a specific metadata provider. If the provider is null, then the default provider will be used.
        Parameters:
        provider - metadata provider or null for the default
        mediaFile - mediafile or mediafile title
        Returns:
        metadata

      • GetInActiveMetadataProviders

        public IMetadataProviderInfo[] GetInActiveMetadataProviders()
        Deprecated. configure using web ui, or using Configuration Metadata
        Get an array of metadata providers that are installed, but are not currently in use.
        Returns:
        array of metadata providers not currently being used

      • GetActiveMetadataProviders

        public IMetadataProviderInfo[] GetActiveMetadataProviders()
        Deprecated. configure using web ui, or using Configuration Metadata
        Get an array of metadata providers that are currently being used to perform metadata lookups/fanart downloading. The array is ordered in the order in which they will be querried for results.
        Returns:
        Array of metadata providers that is being used for metadata lookups

      • GetInstalledMetadataProviders

        public IMetadataProviderInfo[] GetInstalledMetadataProviders()
        Deprecated. configure using web ui, or using Configuration Metadata
        Get an array of all the available metadata providers installed in the system.
        Returns:
        all metadata providers

      • IsActiveMetadataProvider

        public boolean IsActiveMetadataProvider(IMetadataProviderInfo pi)
        Deprecated. configure using web ui, or using Configuration Metadata
        Tests whether a given metadata provider is currently active and will potentially be used for metadata lookups
        Parameters:
        pi - metadata provider
        Returns:
        true if the metadata provider is active

      • IncreaseMetadataProviderPriority

        public void IncreaseMetadataProviderPriority(IMetadataProviderInfo pi)
        Deprecated. configure using web ui, or using Configuration Metadata
        within the array of active metadata providers, increase the priority of this provide. ie, move it up in the list.
        Parameters:
        pi - metadata provider

      • DecreaseMetadataProviderPriority

        public void DecreaseMetadataProviderPriority(IMetadataProviderInfo pi)
        Deprecated. configure using web ui, or using Configuration Metadata
        within the array of active metadata providers, decrease the priority of this provider. ie, move it down in the list.
        Parameters:
        pi -

      • AddActiveMetadataProvider

        public void AddActiveMetadataProvider(IMetadataProviderInfo pi)

      • RemoveActiveMetadataProvider

        public void RemoveActiveMetadataProvider(IMetadataProviderInfo pi)
        Deprecated. configure using web ui, or using Configuration Metadata
        remove the metadata provider from the list of metadata providers. It is still in the instaled list of providers.
        Parameters:
        pi -

      • IsMetadataProviderSupportEnabled

        public boolean IsMetadataProviderSupportEnabled()
        Deprecated. configure using web ui, or using Configuration Metadata
        returns true if the current metadata provider support api is enabled. in the event that no api is installed, a stub api is created which return false. this is here to enable stv developers to check for the existence of metadata search support, and if this is enabled, then calling search methods on this api should also work.
        Returns:
        true if metadata searching support is enabled

      • GetMetadataKeys

        public java.lang.String[] GetMetadataKeys(java.lang.String type)
        Deprecated. configure using web ui, or using Configuration Metadata
        Get the known metadata keys for a given type. The type can be "S" for Core Sage, "A" for all keys, or "E" for extended keys.
        Parameters:
        type - "A" for all, "S" for core sage, "E" for extended
        Returns:

      • GetMetadataLabel

        public java.lang.String GetMetadataLabel(java.lang.String key)
        Deprecated. configure using web ui, or using Configuration Metadata
        Return a custom metadata label for a given metadata item.
        Parameters:
        key - Metadata key
        Returns:
        label

      • GetMetadataDescription

        public java.lang.String GetMetadataDescription(java.lang.String key)
        Deprecated. configure using web ui, or using Configuration Metadata
        return the metadata key description for a given key. The description can be a simple description of the property, such as telling the user the preferred data type, range, etc.
        Parameters:
        key - metadata key
        Returns:
        description
